vendor open items Open Items by Vendor
section.para: To view open A/P open items by Vendor, select the "Open Items by Vendor" option. The following screen will appear:
When displaying A/P open items by Vendor, you are presented with the following options:

listitem.para: Enter the Vendor number of the Vendor whose A/P open items you want to display.
A/P open items for the specified Vendor entered on and after this date will be displayed.
A/P open items for the specified Vendor entered on and before this date will be displayed.
Display lists A/P open items by Vendor, using the specified parameters.

section.para: To the far right of the screen, the following buttons are available:

listitem.para: Closes the screen, returning you to the application desktop.
Select to generate the display, using the specified parameters.
Runs the report associated with this screen.

section.para: Right-clicking on an Item in the A/P open items list enables you to select from the following menu options:
